sampling_planners.core.utils module

sampling_planners.core.utils.calculate_path_cost(path, cost_map, weights)[source]

Calculates weighted path cost. :param path: Sequence of (x, y) points. :type path: list of tuple :param cost_map: 2D cost map. :type cost_map: np.ndarray :param weights: {'length': float, 'cost': float} :type weights: dict

Returns:

Weighted cost J.

Return type:

float

sampling_planners.core.utils.collision_check(line, cost_map, threshold=0.99, step=1.0)[source]

Checks if the line segment is collision-free. :param line: ((x0, y0), (x1, y1)) endpoints. :type line: tuple :param cost_map: 2D cost map. :type cost_map: np.ndarray :param threshold: Maximum allowed cost value. :type threshold: float :param step: Step size for interpolation. :type step: float

Returns:

True if collision-free, False otherwise.

Return type:

bool

Euclidean distance heuristic.

sampling_planners.core.utils.nearest_neighbor(nodes, point)[source]

Finds nearest node using KDTree. :param nodes: Node coordinates. :type nodes: list of tuple :param point: Query point. :type point: tuple

Returns:

Nearest node.

Return type:

tuple
